# addAction(_:)

**Instance Method**

Submit an action tied to this interaction. If the interaction gets canceled, all the associated actions will be automatically rolled back.

## Declaration

```swift
func addAction(_ action: some TabletopAction)
```

## Parameters

- **action**: The action to submit.

## Performing actions

- **TabletopInteraction.Delegate**: A protocol for objects that manage the entire flow of players interacting with equipment.
- **TabletopInteraction.TossOutcome**: An object representing the final outcome of tossing one equipment, as it appears at the end of its simulation.
- **addAction(_:)**: Submit a custom action tied to this interaction. If the interaction gets canceled, all the associated actions will be automatically rolled back.
- **addActions(_:)**: Submit a collection of actions tied to this interaction. If the interaction gets canceled, all the associated actions will be automatically rolled back.
- **toss(equipmentID:as:linearVelocity:angularVelocity:)**: Begins a simulation of a toss of the equipment with the specificied parameters. Equipment that begins a toss in the same TabletopInteraction may interact with each other as well as the game’s boundary.
- **end()**: Ends the current interaction.
- **cancel()**: Cancels the current interaction. All actions added to the interaction will also be cancelled.
